ISSUE.TITLE: request: add the dependency of lua-resty-hmac
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Now Apache APISIX does not declare the dependency on lua-resty-hmac, but implicitly installs it through [lua-resty-jwt](https://luarocks.org/modules/cdbattags/lua-resty-jwt). There are two problems with this approach: 1. Lua-resty-hmac cannot be updated in time 2. Implicit installation will cause confusion to users Therefore, we should: 1. Update lua-resty-jwt to the latest version, and check whether other lua-resty-* is updated; 2. Add dependency on[ lua-resty-hmac](https://github.com/jkeys089/lua-resty-hmac) in the luarocks of Apache APISIX

COMMIT.MESSAGE: feat: upgrade lua-resty-jwt & install lua-resty-hmac-ffi Fix #2256
